title: Riot member to celebrate 1000th win
body: Got 1000 wins recently and would love to play with a rioter to celebrate

replies.body:
Sephyre is a legend for this. :)

P.S. Sephyre's a legend overall.
Add me in game! Lets set this up :)
you'll be waiting a while, think i'm on about 1200 now and i play mostly ranked
